trans-unit.source: Network modules also use the control node as a destination for backup files, for those modules that offer a backup option. With Linux/Unix modules, where a configuration file already exists on the managed node(s), the backup file gets written by default in the same directory as the new, changed file. Network modules do not update configuration files on the managed nodes, because network configuration is not written in files. Network modules write backup files on the control node, usually in the backup directory under the playbook root directory.
trans-unit.target: 对于那些提供 backup 选项的模块，网络模块还将控制节点用作备份文件的目标。对于Linux / Unix模块，在受管节点上已经存在配置文件的情况下，默认情况下将备份文件写入与更改后的新文件相同的目录中。网络模块不会在受管节点上更新配置文件，因为网络配置未写入文件中。网络模块通常在剧本根目录下的 backup 目录中，在控制节点上写入备份文件。

trans-unit.source: Network modules support the use of a proxy or jump host with the ProxyCommand parameter. However, when you use a jump host, Ansible must open a new SSH connection for every task, even if you are using a persistent connection type (network_cli or netconf). To maximize the performance benefits of the persistent connection types introduced in version 2.5, avoid using jump hosts whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 网络模块支持通过 ProxyCommand 参数使用代理或跳转主机。但是，当您使用跳转主机时，即使您使用的是持久连接类型（ network_cli 或 netconf ），Ansible也必须为每个任务打开一个新的SSH连接。为了最大程度地发挥版本2.5中引入的持久连接类型的性能优势，请尽可能避免使用跳转主机。

trans-unit.source: Networks to configure. Valid value is a list of network prefixes to advertise. The list must be in the form of an array. Each entry in the array must include a prefix address and an optional route-map. For example [['10.0.0.0/16', 'routemap_LA'], ['192.168.1.1', 'Chicago'], ['192.168.2.0/24'], ['192.168.3.0/24', 'routemap_NYC']].
trans-unit.target: 要配置的网络。有效值是要发布广告的网络前缀列表。列表必须以数组的形式存在,数组中的每个条目必须包括前缀地址和可选的路由映射。数组中的每个条目必须包括一个前缀地址和一个可选的路由映射。例如 [['10.0.0.0/16','routemap_LA'],['192.168.1.1','Chicago'],['192.168.2.0/24'],['192.168.3.0/24','routemap_NYC']]。

trans-unit.source: Noparameter, After the number of received routes exceeds the threshold and the timeout timer expires,no action. AlertOnly, An alarm is generated and no additional routes will be accepted if the maximum number of routes allowed have been received. IdleForever, The connection that is interrupted is not automatically re-established if the maximum number of routes allowed have been received. IdleTimeout, After the number of received routes exceeds the threshold and the timeout timer expires, the connection that is interrupted is automatically re-established.
trans-unit.target: Noparameter,当接收到的路由数量超过阈值且超时时间过后,不进行任何操作。AlertOnly,如果接收到的路由数量超过了最大允许的数量,就会产生报警,并且不会再接受额外的路由。IdleForever,如果接收到最大数量的路由,被中断的连接不会自动重新建立。IdleTimeout,当接收到的路由数量超过阈值且超时时间结束后,被中断的连接将自动重新建立。

trans-unit.source: Normal behavior is to "skip" tasks that fail dependency checks, so other tasks can run.

trans-unit.source: Normally ansible-playbook will print a header for each task that is run. These headers will contain the name: field from the task if you specified one. If you didn’t then ansible-playbook uses the task’s action to help you tell which task is presently running. Sometimes you run many of the same action and so you want more information about the task to differentiate it from others of the same action. If you set this variable to True in the config then ansible-playbook will also include the task’s arguments in the header. This setting defaults to False because there is a chance that you have sensitive values in your parameters and you do not want those to be printed. If you set this to True you should be sure that you have secured your environment’s stdout (no one can shoulder surf your screen and you aren’t saving stdout to an insecure file) or made sure that all of your playbooks explicitly added the no_log: True parameter to tasks which have sensitive values See How do I keep secret data in my playbook? for more information.
trans-unit.target: 通常， ansible-playbook 将为运行的每个任务打印一个标题。这些标题将包含任务中的name：字段（如果您指定了一个）。如果您不这样做，那么 ansible-playbook 会使用任务的操作来帮助您判断当前正在运行的任务。有时您运行许多相同的动作，因此您需要有关该任务的更多信息，以使其与同一动作的其他任务区分开。如果您在配置中将此变量设置为True，那么 ansible-playbook 还将在标题中包含任务的参数。此设置默认为False，因为您的参数中可能会包含敏感值，并且您不希望打印这些值。如果将其设置为True，则应确保已保护环境的标准输出（没有人可以浏览屏幕，并且没有将标准输出保存到不安全的文件中）或确保所有剧本都明确添加了 no_log: True 具有敏感值的任务的真实参数，请参见如何将机密数据保存在剧本中？想要查询更多的信息。

trans-unit.source: Normally ansible-playbook will print a header for each task that is run. These headers will contain the name: field from the task if you specified one. If you set this variable to True in the config then ansible-playbook will also include the task’s arguments in the header.This setting defaults to False because there is a chance that you have sensitive values in your parameters and you do not want those to be printed.If you set this to True you should be sure that you have secured your environment’s stdout (no one can shoulder surf your screen and you aren’t saving stdout to an insecure file) or made sure that all of your playbooks explicitly added the no_log: True parameter to tasks which have sensitive values See How do I keep secret data in my playbook? for more information.

trans-unit.target: 请注意， timeout 和 time_until_up 可以控制何时设置资源。

trans-unit.source: Note that Ansible 2.7 and earlier only supported one mode, which had to be one of ro, rw, z, and Z.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Ansible 2.7和更早版本仅支持一种模式，该模式必须是 ro ， rw ， z 和 Z 之一。

trans-unit.source: Note that BIG-IPs can only have one of each type of each certificate/key type. This means that you can only have one RSA, one DSA, and one ECDSA per profile.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,BIG-IP 的每个证书/密钥类型只能有一个。这意味着每个配置文件只能有一个RSA、一个DSA和一个ECDSA。

trans-unit.target: 注意,Cisco UCS Manager 使用 VLAN '4048'。如果您想将'4048'分配给VLAN,请参见UCS Manager配置指南。

trans-unit.source: Note that Docker SDK for Python < 2.0 only supports host. Newer versions of the Docker SDK for Python (docker) allow all values supported by the Docker daemon.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，用于Python <2.0的Docker SDK仅支持 host 。较新版本的Docker SDK for Python（docker）允许Docker守护程序支持所有值。

trans-unit.source: Note that VMware Tools are required for this flag.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,此标志需要使用VMware Tools。

trans-unit.source: Note that Virtual Machine will be paused while saving the memory.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,在保存内存时,虚拟机将被暂停。

trans-unit.source: Note that according to the RFC, this extension should not be marked as critical, as old clients not knowing about OCSP Must Staple are required to reject such certificates (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7633#section-4).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，根据RFC，此扩展不应标记为关键，因为不了解OCSP Must Staple的旧客户端需要拒绝此类证书（请参阅https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7633#section-4）。

trans-unit.source: Note that all computer SAMAccountNames need to end with a $.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,所有的计算机SAMAccountNames都需要以$结尾。

trans-unit.source: Note that all replicated protection groups are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 注意,所有复制的保护组都是异步的。

trans-unit.source: Note that an Active Directory forest can specify a minimum TTL, and will dynamically "round up" other values to that minimum.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,活动目录森林可以指定一个最小的TTL,并将动态 "四舍五入 "其他值到该最小值。

trans-unit.source: Note that an empty string in rsync_opts will end up transfer the current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， rsync_opts 中的空字符串最终将传输当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: Note that as opposed to docker run ..., docker_container does not remove the default network if networks is specified. You need to explicitly use purge_networks to enforce the removal of the default network (and all other networks not explicitly mentioned in networks). Alternatively, use the networks_cli_compatible option, which will be enabled by default from Ansible 2.12 on.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，而不是 docker run ... ，docker_container不一样，如果删除默认的网络网络中指定。您需要显式使用purge_networks强制删除默认网络（以及在network中未明确提及的所有其他网络）。另外，也可以使用networks_cli_compatible选项，该选项默认从Ansible 2.12开始启用。

trans-unit.source: Note that before 2.6 this option was incorrectly labeled as a boolean for a long time.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,在2.6之前,这个选项在很长一段时间内被错误地标注为布尔值。

trans-unit.source: Note that before Ansible 2.7.9, the return variable was documented as ansible_swarm_service, while the module actually returned a variable called ansible_docker_service. The variable was renamed to swarm_service in both code and documentation for Ansible 2.7.9 and Ansible 2.8.0. In Ansible 2.7.x, the old name ansible_docker_service can still be used.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在Ansible 2.7.9之前，返回变量记录为 ansible_swarm_service ，而模块实际上返回了一个称为 ansible_docker_service 的变量。在Ansible 2.7.9和Ansible 2.8.0的代码和文档中，该变量都重命名为 swarm_service 。在Ansible 2.7.x中，仍可以使用旧名称 ansible_docker_service 。

trans-unit.source: Note that both ARP and ICMP Echo must be disabled in order for forwarding virtual servers using that virtual address to forward ICMP packets.
trans-unit.target: 注意,必须禁用ARP和ICMP Echo,才能让使用该虚拟地址的虚拟服务器转发ICMP数据包。

trans-unit.source: Note that currently we support only compatibility version 0.10 of the qcow disk.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,目前我们只支持兼容0.10版本的qcow盘。

trans-unit.source: Note that docker CLI also sets network_mode to the name of the first network added if --network is specified. For more compatibility with docker CLI, you explicitly have to set network_mode to the name of the first network you're adding.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果指定了 --network ,则Docker CLI还将network_mode设置为添加的第一个网络的名称。为了与Docker CLI更具兼容性，您必须显式地将network_mode设置为要添加的第一个网络的名称。

trans-unit.source: Note that double quotes in values will be suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,数值中的双引号将被抑制。

trans-unit.source: Note that due to limitations of the underlying NITRO API a disabled state change alone does not cause the module result to report a changed status.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于基础NITRO API的限制，仅 disabled 状态更改不会导致模块结果报告更改状态。

trans-unit.source: Note that exactly one of account_key_src, account_key_content, private_key_src or private_key_content must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，必须确切指定 account_key_src ， account_key_content ， private_key_src 或 private_key_content 中的一个。

trans-unit.source: Note that facts are not part of registered vars but accessible directly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,事实并不是注册变量的一部分,而是可以直接访问。

trans-unit.source: Note that facts are not part of the registered output but available directly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,事实不属于登记的产出,而是可以直接获得。

trans-unit.source: Note that facts are part of the registered vars since Ansible 2.8. For compatibility reasons, the facts are also accessible directly as docker_container. Note that the returned fact will be removed in Ansible 2.12.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，事实是自Ansible 2.8起已注册的变量的一部分。出于兼容性原因，也可以直接通过 docker_container 访问这些事实。请注意，返回的事实将在Ansible 2.12中删除。

trans-unit.source: Note that facts are part of the registered vars since Ansible 2.8. For compatibility reasons, the facts are also accessible directly as docker_network. Note that the returned fact will be removed in Ansible 2.12.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，事实是自Ansible 2.8起已注册的变量的一部分。出于兼容性原因，也可以直接通过 docker_network 访问这些事实。请注意，返回的事实将在Ansible 2.12中删除。

trans-unit.source: Note that facts are part of the registered vars since Ansible 2.8. For compatibility reasons, the facts are also accessible directly as docker_volume. Note that the returned fact will be removed in Ansible 2.12.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，事实是自Ansible 2.8起已注册的变量的一部分。出于兼容性原因，也可以直接通过 docker_volume 访问这些事实。请注意，返回的事实将在Ansible 2.12中删除。

trans-unit.source: Note that facts are part of the registered vars since Ansible 2.8. For compatibility reasons, the facts are also accessible directly. The service's name is the variable with which the container dictionary can be accessed. Note that the returned facts will be removed in Ansible 2.12.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,自Ansible 2.8以来,事实是注册变量的一部分。出于兼容性的原因,事实也可以直接访问。服务的名称是可以访问容器字典的变量。请注意,返回的事实将在Ansible 2.12中被删除。

trans-unit.source: Note that for ACME v2, only the order_uri entry of data will be used. For ACME v1, data must be non-empty to indicate the second stage is active; all needed data will be taken from the CSR.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，对于ACME v2，将仅使用 data 的 order_uri 条目。对于ACME v1， data 必须为非空值以指示第二阶段处于活动状态；所有需要的数据将从CSR中获取。

trans-unit.source: Note that for InstanceTemplate, specify the disk name, not the URL for the disk.
trans-unit.target: 注意,对于InstanceTemplate,要指定磁盘名称,而不是磁盘的URL。

trans-unit.source: Note that for interactive protocols such as Telnet, rlogin, or SSH, F5 recommends disabling this setting on high-latency networks, to improve application responsiveness.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,对于Telnet、rlogin或SSH等交互式协议,F5建议在高延迟网络上禁用此设置,以提高应用响应速度。

trans-unit.source: Note that for repeated values, only the last one will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 注意,对于重复的值,只返回最后一个。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果未设置name且 state=present ，则将始终创建一个新的crontab条目，而不管其是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Note that if no SAN is specified, but a common name, the common name will be added as a SAN except if useCommonNameForSAN is set to false.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果未指定SAN，但指定了通用名称，则将通用名称添加为SAN，除非 useCommonNameForSAN 设置为false。

trans-unit.source: Note that if not using the built in monitors they must first be setup.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果不使用内置的显示器,必须先进行设置。

trans-unit.source: Note that if specifying an IP address, a value between 1 and 65535 must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果指定IP地址,必须指定1到65535之间的值。

trans-unit.target: 请注意,不支持图像ID(哈希)。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，在oVirt / RHV 4.1中，如果要使用非管理员用户，则必须在引擎中启用ENGINE_API_FILTER_BY_DEFAULT变量。在oVirt / RHV 4.2及更高版本中，默认情况下启用了该功能。

trans-unit.source: Note that it will cost a lot of time when list all storageaccount rather than query a single one.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,当列出所有的存储账户而不是查询单个账户时,会花费很多时间。

trans-unit.source: Note that jinja2 already provides some like abs() and round().
trans-unit.target: 请注意,jinja2已经提供了一些如abs()和round()。

trans-unit.source: Note that memory snapshots take time and resources, this will take longer time to create.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,内存快照需要时间和资源,这将需要更长的时间来创建。

trans-unit.source: Note that not all curves are supported by all versions of cryptography.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，并非所有版本的 cryptography 都支持所有曲线。

trans-unit.source: Note that only one free IoT hub instance is allowed in each subscription. Exception will be thrown if free instances exceed one.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,每个订阅中只允许一个免费的物联网中心实例。如果免费实例超过一个,将抛出异常。

trans-unit.source: Note that only one of fqdn and dns_info setting is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,fqdn和dns_info的设置只允许有一个。

trans-unit.source: Note that only the date (day, month, year) is supported for specifying the expiry date of the issued certificate.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,只有日期(日、月、年)被支持用于指定所发证书的到期日。

trans-unit.source: Note that only the date (day, month, year) is supported for specifying the expiry date. If you choose to specify an expiry time with the expiry date, the time will be adjusted to Eastern Standard Time (EST). This could have the unintended effect of moving your expiry date to the previous day.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,只有日期(日、月、年)才支持指定到期日。如果您选择用到期日指定到期时间,时间将被调整为东部标准时间(EST)。这可能会产生将到期日移至前一天的意外效果。

trans-unit.source: Note that raidAll will be treated as raidDiskPool and raid3 as raid5.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,raidAll将被视为raidDiskPool,raid3将被视为raid5。

trans-unit.source: Note that reloaded will start the service if it is not already started, even if your chosen init system wouldn't normally.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,如果服务尚未启动,即使你选择的init系统通常不会启动,重载也会启动该服务。

trans-unit.source: Note that removing a storage pool currently requires the removal of all defined volumes first.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,目前移除存储池需要先移除所有定义的卷。

trans-unit.source: Note that some individuals have confirmed successful operation on Windows 2008R2 servers with AD and AD Web Services enabled, but this has not received the same degree of testing as Windows 2012R2.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,有些人已经确认在启用AD和AD Web服务的Windows 2008R2服务器上成功运行,但这还没有得到与Windows 2012R2相同程度的测试。

trans-unit.source: Note that the API call returns when the failover IP has been successfully routed to the new address, respectively successfully unrouted.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,当故障转移IP已经成功路由到新地址时,API调用会返回,分别是成功取消路由。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，AWS库存脚本将缓存结果以避免重复的API调用，并且此缓存设置可在ec2.ini中配置。要显式清除缓存，可以使用 --refresh-cache 参数运行ec2.py脚本：

trans-unit.source: Note that the Docker SDK for Python only allows to specify the path to the Docker configuration for very few functions. In general, it will use $HOME/.docker/config.json if the DOCKER_CONFIG environment variable is not specified, and use $DOCKER_CONFIG/config.json otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，用于Python的Docker SDK仅允许为很少的功能指定Docker配置的路径。通常，如果未指定 DOCKER_CONFIG 环境变量，它将使用 $HOME/.docker/config.json ，否则使用 $DOCKER_CONFIG/config.json 。

trans-unit.source: Note that the F5 Ansible developers specifically leave this on to make you aware that your usage of this module may be better served by official F5 Ansible modules. This module should always be used as a last resort.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,F5 Ansible 开发者特别将此功能打开,以使您意识到您对该模块的使用可能由 F5 Ansible 官方模块提供更好的服务。该模块应始终作为最后的手段使用。

trans-unit.source: Note that the HAProxy step looks a little complicated. We’re using HAProxy in this example because it’s freely available, though if you have (for instance) an F5 or Netscaler in your infrastructure (or maybe you have an AWS Elastic IP setup?), you can use modules included in core Ansible to communicate with them instead. You might also wish to use other monitoring modules instead of nagios, but this just shows the main goal of the ‘pre tasks’ section – take the server out of monitoring, and take it out of rotation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，HAProxy步骤看起来有些复杂。我们在此示例中使用的是HAProxy，因为它是免费提供的，尽管如果您的基础架构中有（例如）F5或Netscaler（或者您有AWS Elastic IP设置？），则可以使用核心Ansible中包含的模块来与他们交流。您可能还希望使用其他监视模块而不是nagios，但这仅显示了“预任务”部分的主要目标–使服务器脱离监视，使其脱离旋转。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，OpenStack动态清单脚本将缓存结果，以避免重复的API调用。要显式清除缓存，可以使用 --refresh 参数运行openstack_inventory.py（或主机）脚本：

trans-unit.source: Note that the Python redis library should be installed from pip, the version packaged in EPEL is too old for use by Ansible.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,Python redis库应该从pip中安装,EPEL中打包的版本太老,不适合Ansible使用。

trans-unit.source: Note that the Windows path delimiter \ must be escaped as \\ when the line is double quoted.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，当该行用双引号引起来时，Windows路径定界符 \ 必须转义为 \\ 。

trans-unit.source: Note that the above system only governs the return value of failure of the particular task, so if you have an undefined variable used or a syntax error, it will still raise an error that users will need to address. Note that this will not prevent failures on connection or execution issues. This feature only works when the task must be able to run and return a value of ‘failed’.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，上述系统仅控制特定任务失败的返回值，因此，如果您使用了未定义的变量或语法错误，它仍然会引发用户需要解决的错误。请注意，这不会防止连接或执行问题失败。仅当任务必须能够运行并返回值“ failed”时，此功能才起作用。

trans-unit.source: Note that the datapath status is determined by the association of health monitor profiles.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,数据路径状态是由健康监控器配置文件的关联决定的。

trans-unit.source: Note that the default value "na" stands for "North America".
trans-unit.target: 请注意,默认值 "na "代表 "北美洲"。

trans-unit.source: Note that the default zone can be configured per system but public is default from upstream.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，可以为每个系统配置默认区域，但从上游默认为 public 区域。

trans-unit.source: Note that the disk is not downloaded when the file already exists, but you can forcibly download the disk when using force I (true).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果文件已经存在，则不会下载该磁盘，但是当使用 force I（true）时，可以强制下载该磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Note that the fastest aggregate type with at least one aggregate on each node of the cluster will be selected.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,集群的每个节点上至少有一个集合的最快集合类型将被选中。

trans-unit.source: Note that the list of advanced options (with description and values) can be found by running `vim-cmd hostsvc/advopt/options`.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,可以通过运行`vim-cmd hostsvc/advopt/options`找到高级选项列表(包括描述和值)。

trans-unit.source: Note that the majority of TACACS+ implementations are of protocol type ip, so try that first.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，大多数TACACS +实现都是协议类型 ip ，因此请首先尝试。

trans-unit.source: Note that the majority of TACACS+ implementations are of service type ppp, so try that first.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，大多数TACACS +实现都是服务类型 ppp ，因此请首先尝试。

trans-unit.source: Note that the monitors must have already been setup possibly using the netscaler_lb_monitor module or some other method
trans-unit.target: 请注意,监控器必须已经被设置,可能是使用netscaler_lb_monitor模块或其他方法。

trans-unit.source: Now that you have an automated way to deploy updates to your application, how do you tie it all together? A lot of organizations use a continuous integration tool like Jenkins or Atlassian Bamboo to tie the development, test, release, and deploy steps together. You may also want to use a tool like Gerrit to add a code review step to commits to either the application code itself, or to your Ansible playbooks, or both.
trans-unit.target: 现在您已经拥有了将更新部署到应用程序的自动化方法，如何将它们捆绑在一起？许多组织使用诸如Jenkins或Atlassian Bamboo之类的持续集成工具来将开发，测试，发布和部署步骤联系在一起。您可能还想使用Gerrit之类的工具来添加代码审查步骤，以提交给应用程序代码本身或提交给Ansible剧本，或同时提交给这两个代码。

trans-unit.target: 既然您了解了Ansible执行的基本要素，就可以学习使用Ansible Playbooks自动执行重复性任务了。

trans-unit.source: Now you have a fully-deployed site with web servers, a load balancer, and monitoring. How do you update it? This is where Ansible’s orchestration features come into play. While some applications use the term ‘orchestration’ to mean basic ordering or command-blasting, Ansible refers to orchestration as ‘conducting machines like an orchestra’, and has a pretty sophisticated engine for it.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您有了一个具有Web服务器，负载平衡器和监视功能的完全部署的站点。您如何更新它？这就是Ansible的业务流程功能发挥作用的地方。尽管某些应用程序使用“编排”一词来表示基本的命令或命令爆破，但Ansible将编排称为“像乐团一样的导电机器”，并具有相当复杂的引擎。

trans-unit.source: Now you need to supply the information about the existing virtual machine which will be renamed. For renaming virtual machine, vmware_guest module uses VMware UUID, which is unique across vCenter environment. This value is autogenerated and can not be changed. You will use vmware_guest_facts module to find virtual machine and get information about VMware UUID of the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您需要提供有关将被重命名的现有虚拟机的信息。为了重命名虚拟机， vmware_guest 模块使用VMware UUID，这在vCenter环境中是唯一的。此值是自动生成的，不能更改。您将使用 vmware_guest_facts 模块查找虚拟机，并获取有关虚拟机的VMware UUID的信息。

trans-unit.source: Now you need to supply the information about the virtual machine which will be created. Give your virtual machine a name, one that conforms to all VMware requirements for naming conventions. Next, select the display name of the template from which you want to clone new virtual machine. This must match what’s displayed in VMware Web UI exactly. Then you can specify a folder to place this new virtual machine in. This path can either be a relative path or a full path to the folder including the Datacenter. You may need to specify a state for the virtual machine. This simply tells the module which action you want to take, in this case you will be ensure that the virtual machine exists and is powered on. An optional parameter is wait_for_ip_address, this will tell Ansible to wait for the virtual machine to fully boot up and VMware Tools is running before completing this task.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您需要提供有关将要创建的虚拟机的信息。为您的虚拟机命名，该名称应符合VMware的所有命名约定要求。接下来，选择要从其克隆新虚拟机的模板的显示名称。这必须完全匹配VMware Web UI中显示的内容。然后，您可以指定一个文件夹来放置新的虚拟机。该路径可以是包含数据中心的文件夹的相对路径或完整路径。您可能需要为虚拟机指定状态。这只是告诉模块您要执行的操作，在这种情况下，将确保虚拟机存在并已打开电源。可选参数是 wait_for_ip_address ，这将告诉Ansible等待虚拟机完全启动并且VMware Tools正在运行，然后再完成此任务。

trans-unit.source: ONLINE
trans-unit.target: ONLINE

trans-unit.source: ONLINE - Backend server is fully operational. OFFLINE_SOFT - When a server is put into OFFLINE_SOFT mode, connections are kept in use until the current transaction is completed. This allows to gracefully detach a backend. OFFLINE_HARD - When a server is put into OFFLINE_HARD mode, the existing connections are dropped, while new incoming connections aren't accepted either. If omitted the proxysql database default for status is ONLINE.
trans-unit.target: 联机-后端服务器完全可以运行。OFFLINE_SOFT-将服务器置于 OFFLINE_SOFT 模式时，连接将保持使用状态，直到当前事务完成为止。这允许优雅地分离后端。OFFLINE_HARD-将服务器置于 OFFLINE_HARD 模式时，现有连接将被丢弃，新连接也将不被接受。如果省略，则proxysql数据库的默认状态为 ONLINE 。

trans-unit.source: OS10 configurations use a simple block indent file syntax for segmenting configuration into sections. This module provides an implementation for working with OS10 configuration sections in a deterministic way.

trans-unit.source: OS10 supports Enable Mode (Privilege Escalation). This page offers details on how to use Enable Mode on OS10 in Ansible.
trans-unit.target: OS10支持启用模式(特权升级)。本页提供了在Ansible中如何在OS10上使用Enable Mode的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Of course in the above, the “take out of the pool” and “add back” steps would be replaced with a call to a Ansible load balancer module or appropriate shell command. You might also have steps that use a monitoring module to start and end an outage window for the machine.
trans-unit.target: 当然，在上面，“从池中取出”和“添加回”步骤将由对Ansible负载均衡器模块的调用或适当的Shell命令代替。您可能还具有使用监视模块启动和结束机器的停机窗口的步骤。

trans-unit.source: Of course sending out a mail can be equally useful as a way to notify one or more people in a team that a specific action has been (successfully) taken.
trans-unit.target: 当然,发送邮件同样可以作为通知团队中的一个或多个人已经(成功)采取了特定行动的方式。

trans-unit.source: Of course, you could just use the command action to call rsync yourself, but you also have to add a fair number of boilerplate options and host facts.
trans-unit.target: 当然，您可以只使用 command 操作自己调用rsync，但还必须添加大量样板选项和主机事实。

trans-unit.source: Of the built-in roles, only Owner and User Access Administrator are granted those actions.
trans-unit.target: 在内置角色中,只有Owner和User Access Administrator被授予这些操作。
